## Source: ossf-package-analysis (894c1111982ca0da409a979979a94aaf118aa9b46c8a1cf45675f0b0ed9c720a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'walletsendmoney-paypal' @ 4.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
